# Pull Request Checklist

## Before Submitting

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have reviewed my own code changes
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or sensitive data
- [ ] My changes follow the repository conventions

## Agent Report (REQUIRED)

- [ ] I have included an `## AGENT REPORT` section in this PR description
- [ ] I have created `docs/agent-reports/<PR-id>-report.md` with the report content
- [ ] My report includes all 9 required sections (see [docs/AGENT_REPORTING.md](../docs/AGENT_REPORTING.md))

## Description

<!-- Describe your changes here -->

## AGENT REPORT
